query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth_audit_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  username VARCHAR(100),
  event_type ENUM('login_success', 'login_failed', 'logout', 'password_change', 'password_reset', '2fa_enabled', '2fa_disabled', '2fa_verified', 'account_locked', 'account_unlocked', 'session_expired', 'token_refresh') NOT NULL,
  auth_method ENUM('local', 'oauth', '2fa') DEFAULT 'local',
  details TEXT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  country VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_username (username),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_event (event_type),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_time (created_at),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_severity (severity)
);

  event_type ENUM('login_success', 'login_failed', 'logout', 'password_change', 'password_reset', '2fa_enabled', '2fa_disabled', '2fa_verified', 'account_locked', 'account_unlocked', 'session_expired', 'token_refresh') NOT NULL,
  auth_method ENUM('local', 'oauth', '2fa') DEFAULT 'local',
  details TEXT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  country VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_username (username),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_event (event_type),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_time (created_at),
  INDEX idx_auth_audit_severity (severity)
);
